title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: A sheer ice cliff rises before you, its wind-scoured surface perfectly smooth and reflecting the chilly glitter of the stars.  The ice is marred by a dark gash that leads into a tunnel.  The opening seems to slope down into the mountain.

A sheer white cliff rises before you, its frozen surface perfectly smooth, scoured by the wind.  The ice is marred by a dark gash that leads into a tunnel.  The opening seems to slope down into the mountain.
